statements: DELETE FROM supply_chain_data WHERE id = 1 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM supply_chain_data WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND value > 100;
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE id = 1 AND temperature > 25;
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND last_updated < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SupplyChainInventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND quantity < 10;
